::Lord Elder::
   
  Elder: We'll need you. Thank you. I should go see Perseus and complete any plans.
   
  He turns to Jotunn.
   
  Elder: Join me?

xochitla2006 <xochitla2006@...> wrote:
          Windlord:

"I'm volunteer"said the male

--- In nbwrpg@yahoogroups.com, Richard Allen <roborick007@...> wrote:
>
> ::Lord Elder::
> 
> Elder: Actually there is quite a bit of preperation to be done. 
We'll need support from the Atlantis government and a willing crew.
>

> 
> "LEtï¿½s do it..."said the male"We3 have not time to loose"

we'll

> with

> > > > > She was visibly depressed but resigned at the same time. 
They 
> > all
> > > > > looked that way.
> > > > > 
> > > > > Dinobot: And [grunt] what might be that plan?
> > > > > 
> > > > > Jotunn: You might know the Airtankers are combiners; they 
> > formed 
> > > up
> > > > > the Airtank vehicle form at the battle in Relay. They also 
> > > combine to
> > > > > form up Stormblaze.
> > > > >

> > > > >

> > Predaking 
> > > used
> > > > > to be, perhaps even more.
> > > > >

> > > Predacons
> > > > now?

> powerful

> > > > > unstable. We all lose our personality when we merge and we 
> > don't

finished 
> in

> > > > > current meeting with Lord Jotunn. Windlord is still looking 
> for

> > > > > though. Patch Windlord through to Perseus.

> > > > > >

> > > > > tell us
> > > > > > anything..." said Salveo with sigh. "Perseus is currently 
> > busy 
> > > helping
> > > > > > out in the medical bay, but if you need to talk to him, I 
> can 
> > > get
> > > > > > ahold of him. i suggest we use double-encryped channels 
or 
> > meet
> > > > > > face-to-face. No telling what these unicronian scum might 
> be 
> > up 
> > > to."
> > > > > >

> > > > > > > ::Lord Elder::

> > > > > > > Elder is monitering the comm channels and comes to 
> realize 
> > > that

> > > > > > > trying to direct all communication and actions through 
> the 
> > > city
> > > > > systems.

> > trying 
> > > to
> > > > raise
> > > > > > > Lord Perseus but i'm sure you can get in touch with 
him. 
> > > Status
> > > > > report:
> > > > > > > Rodimus Prime and Remus both injured. Rodimus' repairs 
> are 
> > > being
> > > > > taken care
> > > > > > > of in the CR chamber. Remus is being repaired in one as 
> > well 
> > > but his
> > > > > > > problems could be caused by means other then just 
> physical 
> > > damage.
> > > > > Actally
> > > > > > > Rodimus Prime is now Hot Rod. The Minions succeded in 
> their
> > > > plans and
> > > > > > > stripped The Matrix of Leadership from Rodimus after he 
> was
> > > > > defeated by
> > > > > > > Cyclonus in combat. Kup is currently watching over Hot 
> Rod 
> > and
> > > > > Remus in the
> > > > > > > base med bay. Relay that to Perseus. Also tell him that 
> we 
> > > have a
> > > > > plan that
> > > > > > > I need to discuss with him.
> > > > > > >

> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > Kup had started to nod off when one of the CR chambers 
> > > chimed. It's
> > > > > > > process was finished. With a hiss the door on the 
chamber 
> > > opened
> > > > > and Hot Rod
> > > > > > > stepped out.
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > The two old friends come face to face.
> > > > > > >

> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > Kup: No you didn't, Roddy. You fought Cyclonus with 
> > > everything you
> > > > > had.
> > > > > > > We'll get The Matrix back.
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > Hot Rod: How? The Minions ae too strong. I couldn't 
beat 
> > one 
> > > of

> > > > > > > heralds with The Matrix. How am I supposed to do it 
> without 
> > > it?
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > Kup: We'll find a way. Elder has a plan. He and 
Windlord 
> > went 
> > > to
> > > > > find Lord
> > > > > > > Perseus and discuss it. The plan is to....
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > Hot Rod: Later, Kup. Where are Nightlight and Elita?
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > Kup: Nightlight is showing Hevn around the city. He 
made a
> > > > > comeback while
> > > > > > > you were fighting Cyclonus. I'm not sure about Elita.
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > Hot Rod opens a comm channel to Nightlight.
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > Hot Rod: Nightlight, this is Rodi... This is Hot Rod. 
Do 
> you
> > > > read me?
> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > He was met with nothing but static.
> > > > > > >

> > > > > > >
> > > > > > > He switches the channel to Elita.
> > > > > > >

honey?
